headline: Evercore initiates coverage on U.S. refiners, sees upside on Phillips 66
summary: Investing.com -- Evercore ISI initiated coverage on U.S. refining companies, rating Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) as Outperform while assigning neutral ratings to Marathon Petroleum (NYSE:MPC) and Valero Energy (NYSE:VLO), citing valuation and operational outlook.
